/My Computer/C:/Documents/strategy.txt.content:
Progression Strategy:

1. Unlock trash tier games first (cheap)
2. Play each to learn mechanics
3. Focus on games you're good at
4. Automate completed games in VMs
5. Use tokens to unlock higher tiers
6. Replay for better performance scores
